snippet: The infant had been delivered prematurely after his mother and father were killed in a car crash in Brooklyn.
abstract: Infant delivered prematurely after parents Raizy and Nathan Glauber were killed in hit-and-run car crash in Brooklyn dies; baby’s death strengthens calls in couple’s tight-knit Orthodox Jewish community in Williamsburg to bring serious criminal charges against driver Julio Acevedo; police say Acevedo was driving at an excessive speed, which can be the basis of criminal charges like manslaughter or homicide.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and JOSEPH BERGER

lead_paragraph: The infant had been delivered prematurely after his mother and father were killed in a car crash in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Baby Whose Parents Were Killed in Crash Also Dies
headline.main: Calls to Charge Driver Grow After Couple’s Newborn Dies
headline.print_headline: Calls to Charge Driver Grow After Couple’s Newborn Dies
